about_the_game:
“Embark on an Mysterious Journey into the Uncharted Depths of the Cloud Sea:
A Tale of a Father and Son’s Unforgettable Encounter and Challenge”

Join Vin, a curious young boy from a small village, as he defies his father’s wishes and visits the town of Calme to become a cloud sea hunter. As he meets quirky residents and explores the town and the cloud sea, he faces numerous mysteries. Vin uses his wit, knowledge, and tools of cloud sea hunting taught by his father to overcome the challenges that come his way.

Discover a world full of secrets:
Why did people build towns on cliffs? What do the ruins scattered throughout the cloud sea imply? And what lies at the bottom of the cloud sea? Uncover the truth that Vin reaches with your own eyes.

Explore a world that changes with time:
In Calme, the actions of residents, the town’s activities, and the state of the cloud sea change with time. Trade with nocturnal residents in distress, explore caves that can only be entered at certain times, and conduct investigations… Unveil the ever-changing environments of towns and the cloud sea to uncover the world’s secrets.

Tools that aid exploration:
After equipping the tools of a cloud sea hunter, don’t forget to bring a gas mask. The character’s homemade “Dango” dishes can serve as both a bait in the cloud sea and as gifts for the residents. Use various tools to avoid or repel dangerous cloud sea creatures, decipher codes left in ruins, and explore the unknown cloud sea.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This is CALME, a peaceful haven on a precipitous cliff. With a rod in your right hand and a dumpling on the other… This is an adventure exploration game set in the town on the cliff, which is more than just a "warm and cozy" place.
